patthana15.66:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.66:0.3_0: Next there are solid nectar with skillful words.
patthana15.66:1.1_0: Wrong thought doesn’t give rise to the skillful teaching.
patthana15.66:1.1_1: Afterwards, you don’t get the skillful thing that gives rise to the unskillful.
patthana15.66:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
patthana15.66:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the unskillful.
patthana15.66:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.66:2.1_3: (These two discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
